class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.EscortRefugeesToPosition
class.description: The knowledge of the 'EscortRefugeesToPosition' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getReachable
method.description: Returns the main objective of the mission (the position).

method.name: getElements
method.description: Returns the refugees units to take into account.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of first line units. This implementation returns the value of '1', meaning that only one subordinate will take the refugees into account.
